abstract: Fire rages through Avalon at Edgwater luxury apartment complex in Edgewater, NJ, displacing over 1,000 residents of complex and surrounding buildings; incident marks sobering moment amid construction boom flanking Hudson River in Bergen and Hudson Counties.
lead_paragraph: A blaze at Avalon at Edgewater displaced more than 1,000 residents of the apartments and surrounding buildings and produced a spectacle rarely seen in an era of modern construction: a luxury development destroyed by fire.

byline.original: By KATE ZERNIKE and JOHN SURICO

snippet: A blaze at Avalon at Edgewater displaced more than 1,000 residents of the apartments and surrounding buildings and produced a spectacle rarely seen in an era of modern construction: a luxury development destroyed by fire.

headline.main: As Construction Booms, Edgewater Fire Provides a Sobering Moment
headline.print_headline: As Construction Booms Along Hudson, Fire Is a Sobering Moment
